featured.text: The ballet dancers’ __________ movements delighted all the audience.

In a panic (B) With delight (C) Out of sorrow (D) Filled with embarrassment 39. (A) they had seen my car (B) there was a shop nearby (C) they had seen two small girls (D) there was a police station in the neighborhood 40.

definition.zh_def: 高興；愉快的心情或狀態
definition.en_def: A feeling of great pleasure or joy.
definition.example: The children's laughter filled the room with delight.
